Package com.epidemic_simulator

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SimulatorCallBack
    This interface declares the methods necessary for the Simulator to issue ecallbacks to an object.
    NOTE: The Simulator only calls the methods of the SimulatorCallBacks that are registered.
    NOTE: The Simulator never calls methods of a Strategy before the first red person has been found.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Person
    /** An object that represent a person and their health status.
    Simulator  
    Strategy  
    Utils
    Utility class for the Epidemic Simulator project.
    It contains some method for extracting random numbers easily, some other for reflections and some utilities for UI.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Simulator.Outcome
    Enum for the possible outcomes of a day execution.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    Strategy.ParameterData
